attributes.action: Open Business Rates Grant Scheme To All Businesses Regardless Of Rateable Value
attributes.additional_details: I want government to implement a grant structure regardless of rateable value/category. Businesses can operate on the basics of labour & supply chain. Business Rates is neither. Falling behind with employee wages or payment to supply chain creditors brings the economy and operations to a stop, businesses will close, unemployment will rise. All businesses are in the same boat. The economy will recover quicker the more people are employed & paying taxes. What benefits the economy. Rates or Taxes.
attributes.background: I want government to open the business rates grant scheme to all businesses of all rateable value or business category to allow businesses to focus their cashflow into paying creditors within supply chains and employee wages. 6 months Rates Free & 3 Months Half Rates then back onto full rates.
